com.teama.pds
Class Model

java.lang.Object
  com.teama.pds.Model

 class Model
extends java.lang.Object

Author: Grant Kurtz, Matthew Frey, Svyatoslav Sivov The Model controller maintains the entire state of the simulation. This model is part of the MVC structure of this program.

Constructor Summary
Model()
          Default Constructor Initializes the entire base portion of the program which will do the majority of the heavy lifting of the simulation.
 
Method Summary

          Adds an new (completed) order to the queue for creation.

Constructor Detail

Model

public Model()
Default Constructor Initializes the entire base portion of the program which will do the majority of the heavy lifting of the simulation.

Method Detail

addOrder

public void addOrder(Order order)
Adds an new (completed) order to the queue for creation.

Parameters:
order - The completed Order to add

startSimulation

public void startSimulation()
Starts the whole simulation. Note, once this is called, orders will immediately start to be processed, resources consumed, and finished resources produced from/into their respective queues.

endSimulation

public void endSimulation()
Halts the simulation, and forces the timer to discontinue looping.

getSimulationStatus

public boolean getSimulationStatus()
Returns:
True if the simulation is running, otherwise false

getTickRate

public double getTickRate()
Returns:
returns the current tick-rate of the internal simulation time counter, in seconds.

getOrders

public ResourceList<Order> getOrders()
Returns:
Returns a list of all orders that still need to be delivered.

setTickRate

void setTickRate(double TICK_RATE_IN_SECONDS)
Parameters:
TICK_RATE_IN_SECONDS - The new rate of the internal counter for the simulation speed.

getTime

public Time getTime()
Returns:
The time object that can be used to manipulate the time of the simulation.

getMenu

public PizzaMenu getMenu()
Returns:
Returns an object that can be used for cloning FoodItems for use in the simulation.

getHistory

public History getHistory()
Returns:
Returns the history of the simulation so the controller can add to it.

getAddresses

public AddressBook getAddresses()
Returns:
Returns the Address Book of the simulation so the controller can add to it.
